reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Seeds of hope Cultural Center

description.narrative: The starting point is to increase the mutual understanding between different religions and work for an athmosphere of peace and harmony. This is done by giving preschool children the possibility to spend their days in that kind of environment. Seeds of Hop e Culture Center consists of a kindergarten and preschool with about 203 students, a cultural center with English courses and a youth center. Around 127 youth take regularly part of the youth activities at the cultural center and the preschool is very popu lar, about 89 students participate in the English courses at the youth center. When the children continue in school they have been praised for their good behaviour and their good English knowledge. The surrounding and the local authorities are positive to the project. The project is a cooperation with Seeds of Hope, Inc, Humanitarian Aid. This organisation have many years of experience from similar work, therefore we cooperate with them.
